name: nw_listener_state_t
desc: States indicating whether a listener is able to accept incoming connections.

items.name: var nw_listener_state_waiting: nw_listener_state_t
items.desc: The listener is waiting for a network to become available.

items.name: var nw_listener_state_ready: nw_listener_state_t
items.desc: The listener is running and able to receive incoming connections.

items.name: var nw_listener_state_failed: nw_listener_state_t
items.desc: The listener has encountered a fatal error.
